title: Create Collection
name: CreateCollection
description: Create a collection for further face registration.

Parameter.description: The tag you want to associate with the upcoming collection.
The description you want to associate with the upcoming collection.

title: Delete Collection
name: DeleteCollection
description: Delete the specific collection.

Parameter.description: The id of collection.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Get Collection
name: GetCollection
description: Get the specific collection.

Parameter.description: The id of collection.

title: Get Collection List
name: GetCollectionList
description: Get the list of collections.

Parameter.description: The max number of collection infos. 0 means unlimited, Default is 0.
Pagination token from the previous response.

Success 200.description: The number of remainings are not listed in this response.
Pagination token for the subsequent request to fetch the next set of collection.

title: Get Collection List Rang
name: GetCollectionListRange
description: Get the list of collections.

Parameter.description: The start index of collection infos. Default is 0.
The max number of collection infos from StartIndex. 0 means unlimited, Default is 0.

title: Update Collection
name: UpdateCollection
description: Update the specific collection.

Parameter.description: The id of collection.
The tag associated with collection you want to update.
The description associated with collection you want to update.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body..

title: Comapre Face
name: CompareFace
description: Compare faces between 2 images.

Parameter.description: The source image file.
The target image file.

Success 200.description: List of face info comparisons were detected.
Bounding box of face was detected, [x, y, w, h].
Bounding box of face was detected, [x, y, w, h].

title: Detect Face
name: DetectFace
description: Detect does any face on the image

Parameter.description: An image file.

Success 200.description: Bounding box of face was detected, [x, y, w, h].

title: Detect Face
name: DetectFace
description: Detect does any face on the image

Parameter.description: An image file.

Success 200.description: Bounding box of face was detect, [left, top, right, buttom].

title: Create Face
name: CreateFace
description: Create a face into the designated collection.

Parameter.description: The id of collection you want the face to be registered in.
The tag you want to associate with the face detect in the image.
An image file.

title: Register Face
name: CreateFace
description: Register an user to service

Parameter.description: An image file.
UserId Id of the user account.

title: Delete Face
name: DeleteFace
description: Delete an exist face from service

Parameter.description: The id of face.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Delete Face
name: DeleteFace
description: Delete an exist user from service

Parameter.description: UserId Id of the user account.

title: Get Face
name: GetFace
description: Get info of specific face on service

Parameter.description: The id of face.

title: Get Face
name: GetFace
description: Get info of specific user on service

Parameter.description: UserId Id of the user account.

title: Get Face List
name: GetFaceList
description: Get list of all faces on service.

Parameter.description: The ids of collection you want to fetch faces. Empty means all collections.
The max number of results to fetch.
Pagination token from the previous response.

Success 200.description: The number of remainings are not listed in this response.
Pagination token for the subsequent request to fetch the next set of faces.

title: Get Face List Range
name: GetFaceListEx
description: Get list of all faces on service.

Parameter.description: The ids of collection you want to fetch faces. Empty means all collections.
The start index of result.
The max number of results to fetch.

title: Get Face List
name: GetFaceListEx
description: Get list of all users on service

Parameter.description: Start index of result.
Number of results to fetch.

title: Update Face
name: UpdateFace
description: Update info for an exist user on service

Parameter.description: The id of face.
The id of registered collection you want the face to be changed.
The tag you want to update.
The image file you want to update.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Update Face
name: UpdateFace
description: Update info for an exist user on service

Parameter.description: UserId Id of the user account.
An image file.

title: Delete Records
name: DeleteRecord
description: Get a list of recognition result about specific user from previously

Parameter.description: The start date time to delete records.
The end date time to delete records.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Delete Records of Face
name: DeleteRecordByFaceId
description: Get a list of recognition result about specific user from previously

Parameter.description: The id of face. (0 means to delete the fail records)
The start date time to delete records.
The end date time to delete records.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Recognize by Image
name: RecognizeImage
description: Detect each face in the image and then find out the face among the collections.

Parameter.description: An image file.
The ids of collections used for face recognition. Empty means all collections.

Success 200.description: Bounding box of face was detect, [x, y, w, h].

title: Recognize by Image
name: RecognizeImage
description: Detect each face in the image and then find out the face among the collections.

Parameter.description: An image file.
The ids of collections used for face recognition. Empty means all collections.
The input image source description for the further record information.

Success 200.description: Bounding box of face was detect, [x, y, w, h].

title: Recognize Face
name: RecognizeImage
description: Recognize does any known face on the image

Parameter.description: An image file.

Success 200.description: Bounding box of face was detect, [left, top, right, buttom].

title: Get Records
name: RecognizeRecord
description: Get a list of recognition result from previously

Parameter.description: The Start date time to fetch records.
The End date time to fetch records.
The max number of results to fetch.
Pagination token from the previous response. The input may cause start/end to be non-functional.

Success 200.description: The id of collection you want the face to be registered in..
The id you want to associate with the face detect in the image.
The input image source description for the further record information.
The creation time when the record was generated.
The number of remainings are not listed in this response.
Pagination token for the subsequent request to fetch the next set of records.

title: Get Records
name: RecognizeRecord
description: Get a list of recognition result from previously

Parameter.description: The Start date time to fetch records.
The End date time to fetch records.
The max number of results to fetch.
Pagination token from the previous response. The input may cause start/end to be non-functional.

Success 200.description: The id of collection you want the face to be registered in..
The id you want to associate with the face detect in the image.
The input image source description for the further record information.
The creation time when the record was generated.
Pagination token for the subsequent request to fetch the next set of records.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "recognitions":[
    {
      "faceId":1,
      "collectionId":1,
      "tag": "860001",
      "image": "https://db.face.com/face_1.jpg",
      "captureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471461645.jpg",
      "source":"#12323#E5 South 2nd Gate",
      "time":"2019-06-14 08:17:41"
    },
    {
      "faceId":2,
      "collectionId":1,
      "tag": "860002",
      "image": "https://db.face.com/face_2.jpg",
      "captureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471461645_1.jpg",
      "source":"#12323#E5 South 2nd Gate",
      "time":"2019-06-14 08:17:41"
    },
    {
      "faceId":0,
      "collectionId":0,
      "tag": "",
      "image": "",
      "captureImage":"http://db.face.com/cap_1560471463251.jpg",
      "source":"#12322#E5 South 1st Gate",
      "time":"2019-06-14 08:17:43"
    },
  ],
  "nextToken":"XAFsdgE347kdfryjbcaq133iGhJ9ScF3"
}

title: Create Stream
name: CreateStream
description: Register an exist RTSP stream for recognition

Parameter.description: The RTSP stream Url for real-time recognition.
The ids of collections used for face recognition. Empty means all collections.

title: Create Stream
name: CreateStream
description: Register an exist RTSP stream for recognition

Parameter.description: The RTSP stream Url for real-time recognition.
The ids of collections used for face recognition. Empty means all collections.
The input stream source description for the further record information. The default value will be RtspUrl.

title: Register Stream
name: CreateStream
description: Register an RTSP stream for recognition

Parameter.description: Url of RTSP stream.

title: Delete Stream
name: DeleteStream
description: Unregister an RTSP stream from service

Parameter.description: The id of stream.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Unregister Stream
name: DeleteStream
description: Unregister an RTSP stream from service

Parameter.description: Id of registered stream.

title: Get Results
name: GetResults
description: Polling the list of recognition result from stream if no subscription.

Parameter.description: The id of stream.
The start date time of results to begin fetch.
The max number of results to fetch.
The retrieval point return by the previous response.

Success 200.description: The id of collection you want the face to be registered in.
The id you want to associate with the face detect in the image.
The input image source description for the further record information.
The creation time when the record was generated.
The retrieval point for the next polling.

title: Get Recognition Result
name: GetResults
description: Get a list of recognition result from stream

Parameter.description: Id of registered stream.
Start index of result.
Number of results to fetch.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Get Stream
name: GetStream
description: Get the registered stream information

Parameter.description: The id of stream.

Success 200.description: The faces in these collections to be recognized. Empty means all collections.
The POST URLs for runtime recognition callbacks.

title: Get Stream
name: GetStream
description: Get the registered stream information

Parameter.description: The id of stream.

Success 200.description: The faces in these collections to be recognized. Empty means all collections.
The POST URLs for runtime recognition callbacks.

name: GetStreamList

title: Get Stream List
name: GetStreamList
description: Get a list of registered stream sources on service

title: Get List of Registed Stream
name: GetStreamList
description: Get a list of registered stream sources on service

title: Subscribe Stream
name: SubStreamResult
description: Subscribe a stream for result callbacks.

Parameter.description: The id of stream.
The url of recognition result to POST.

Success 201.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Subscribe Stream Result
name: SubStreamResult
description: Subscribe a registered stream sources for result

Parameter.description: Id of registered stream.
Url of recognition result to POST.

title: Unsubscribe Stream
name: UnsubStreamResult
description: Unsubscribe a stream for result callbacks.

Parameter.description: The id of stream.
The url of recognition result to POST.

Success 204.description: If successful, this method returns an empty response body.

title: Unsubscribe Stream Result
name: UnsubStreamResult
description: Unsubscribe a registered stream sources for result

Parameter.description: Id of registered stream.
Url of recognition result to POST.
